select count(*) from project where isdeleted = 0
select p.languagenum, l.languagemain, l.languagecolor, count(*) as languagecount from project p join language l on p.languagenum = l.languagenum group by p.languagenum
select SUBSTRING_INDEX(userid, '@', -1) as email, count(*) as emailcount from user where isdeleted = 0 group by email

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(joindate,'%Y-%m-%d') as date, COUNT(*) as count FROM user
WHERE joindate between '2018-01-01' and '2018-12-31' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(joindate,'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(joindate,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(projectdate,'%Y-%m-%d') as date, COUNT(*) as count FROM project WHERE projectdate between '2018-01-01' and '2018-12-31' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(projectdate,'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(projectdate,'%Y-%m-%d')
